title: Doc Parser
description: Extracts text from various document file types such as PDF, Word (DOCX), images (JPG/PNG) using OCR, and other formats like TXT, JSON, CSV, HTML, and Markdown. Ideal for automatic document content parsing.
placeholder: Upload file: PDF, DOCX, TXT, JPG, PNG, JSON, CSV, HTML, MD
